comment: Im coming from a galaxy s5 where I rooted and deleted approx 200 apps I don't use, this is slower and has hundreds more stock apps I don't use. No one who turns off auto update wants an unremovable notification for the last system update, the arrogance of it.

I pre-ordered the phone because amazon told me by chat that they were participing in the galaxy buds promotions of samsung. FAKE, I did not get anything, and now amazon and samsung are saying that is each other fault. They don't want to anything about it.
Not the Snapdragon and phone was not in English.  Returned and went to best buy.

The phone was great at first. Then it started getting really hot and losing battery really fast. Eventually, it turned off and no matter what I did, I couldn't get it to charge back up. I was sent a replacement but unfortunately, the replacement was a blocked phone and I couldn't even use it. Never buying expensive tech from Amazon in the future.

The thumbprint reader is located on the edge of the phone. Top right edge and it means that your phone cases need to have a large cut out right by the edge and every case made for this phone will be very weak right there. I guess it's only a design flaw in the sense that phone cases will be hard to make well for this phone. I personally never use the thumbprint reader. I wish this phone had it on the back or just didn't have one at all. Looking for a case that actually just covers this spot since I never use it and would prefer a good case.Ohterwise, amazing phone. Great camera. Very fast. Still has the headphone jack! It's smaller than anything else this nice. Got a lot of things going for this phone!

This is a beautiful phone. I've had 4 of the previous Galaxy phones, so I'm very well accumulated with Android and Samsung. Everyone knows how awesome android is and how superior Samsung screens are, they continue to get better each time. Unfortunately the screen is too sensitive to use without a case on it.  You simply can't n't hold the phone without your hands or fingers touching the edges and working against what you are actually trying to press. Once my otter box phone case arrive a day later, the problem was solved! Make sure you get all the full updates before adding your fingerprint.  Mine didn't work at all until the update. For whatever reason.Best phone yet!
Loved the phone, but the product listing was for U S version, but two things make believe that i got an international one instead. It was a third-party purchase from electrocell.
Phone was unlocked and brand new, but it is an international model. Therefore, I was unable to activate it.
like italmost the same size as my former Galaxy s7edge

I love this phone I was able to use either a pin number or fingerprint to open. I haven't activated face recognition. Everything loads so fast, nice voice recognition for hands free. I have dropped the phone twice both times onto tile floor without any damage. The charge share feature is great. Battery life is awesome and charging the battery is faster then any cellphone I have ever owned. The slim style is great in the hand or a pocket, fits in a front shirt pocket without weighing it down. Hard to believe that a cellphone can produce the great quality of pictures that it does. Lots of storage space with plenty of gb for files and apps. I would definitely recommend the S10 phone.

Overall I really like this phone. I was worried because of all the reviews saying their box was opened already, or they got the international version instead, overheating, etc.I've had no problems with this phone, I got the US version. No overheating. I did order directly from Amazon and not third party, so that is what I'd reccomend to ensure you're getting what you pay for; I've previously had an unlocked s8 that I've also ordered from Amazon and had no problems with that either.The only slight complaint I have is the fingerprint scanner. I give it 3 stars only because it doesn't unlock the phone instantly like it did with my s8, and you can't see exactly where to put your finger. But that's not a big deal to me personally, just a heads up if you're going to purchase.
Was advertised as to us version but the phone i got was the international version so had to return it

Samsung Galaxy S10+ . This is an awesome phone. Set it with out even going to the Verizon. I just started learning to day. it is a lovely ladies phone the color and shape not too big slender great display. I had another S10+ but this one is different and like the description. the back and front are glass. awesome. Clear plastic cover and my initials in gold on the back Hallelujah. going to take a nap to calm down cause I am so excited and happy thanks to you. God Bless and much success. love MG

When I received the phone in box, I opened the box. Box was packed with sticker that can be removed easily. Usually, the sticker on the box is harder to remove and it create some kind of glue mark on the box when you removing it. Then I opened the box and I see that phone was just open with anything on it(no bag or bubble bag or pad that protects the screen. usually when you buy new phone, everything comes in proper packaging. USB C to USB connector was roaming inside box. it was not on its place. charger was not properly placed. charging cable is usually tide with wire tie. And in this one it was just came without it. Seems some one try to use this phone or some on tempered this phone. or it could be refurbished phone. never know.

So my Samsung S7 took a dive and I needed to replace it ASAP.  I bought this "refreshed" S10 hoping that it wouldn't be full of scratches that I'd need to cover and it wasn't.  I know the features and am more than pleased with the upgraded device and I got it for a stellar price point.  No VZW payment plans for me!

Do not buy this phone! I repeat DO NOT BUY THIS PHONE OR ANY PHONE FROM AMAZON. Amazon will not help you if you need this to be replaced if there is anything wrong with it. I purchased this phone as I loved it when I checked it out. My battery started giving me issues in dying within a few hours. I called in to Amazon while I was travelling on vacation and informed them about the issue. The girl said she made comments about this and as soon as I get back to the USA I can receive a replacement for this item. She created a replacement ticket and I informed her it's not a good idea to send me a phone now as I'll only be back in the US within 2months. The girl told me there will be no issues as soon as you get back give us a call. I just arrived back in the USA from my travels after a month and a half and a new person I spoke to explained to me that unfortunately its outside of the return date and unfortunately I will need to take this up with Samsung. Really Amazon!

DO NOT repeat DO NOT get this phone if you are going to use it on the AT+T network AND you rely on WiFi calling. Which I do. According to AT+T it has no plans in the future to allow any unlocked phones to use WiFi calling, HD calling, VoLTE, or call protect. IT WILL NOT WORK. If you do not care about these features it is a great phone. I was forced to return it for the above reasons.

Hello everyone.I bought this device and was disappointedly disappointed.For some reason, the device came on one SIM-card, whereas the description doesnâ€™t say anything and there is no information, so by default all Samsung come with lots on two SIM-cards.My task in choosing this device was precisely in this, so that I had an expensive flagship with a large functional channel, and I had two SIM cards. Now it's just a piece of expensive iron.If there are solutions on this issue, tell me?If not, then I will have to go to the consumer rights society through lawsuits and thereby return the money spent to empty.I believe that this is consumer fraud.

Is this really gorila glass 6 ? . I had an s9. It never got 1 scratch . This new is less than a month old and already has 3 scratchs.  I am like what happened ? Can anyone explain to me how this happenedOtherwise the phone is incredible the best samsung yet. But really really disappointed that this gorilla glass did not prevent the scratches.... I also put it in my pocket some keys maybe with it but it should not scratch it the gorilla glass was good

The 500GB phone has some weight compared to the 128GB. It's an excellent phone and i'm very happy with it. My one gripe is snapchat though. My phone has the "Warning: Camera Failed" issue like many S10+'s seem to have and i figured out that snapchat has been causing the issue for me. Out of all the fixes online, none seem to work and it's become an inconvience due to how much i use the camera for work. Other than that issue, the phone is great and i would recommend it.

I mistakenly thought the phone was the US version but it is the international model of the phone.  No Snapdragon processor.  Sending it back after getting it on Prime Day for $599.  I would not have purchased it had I known.  Seller needs to make this MORE clear in my opinion.
This is the top of the line phone as far as I am concerned. Top notch cellphone in every respect. You will need to get this powerhouse of a smartphone in a case fast as it is quite slippery .
Great so far. Had to get an update for bluetooth before it would work. So if you get it, try not to get frustrated. Just keep checking for updates if something doesn't work just right
My dad is very excited about his new phone.For the past few days he is updating and learning the new phone.My dad is 78 and he said it is very easy to use.

Cannot use the fingerprint reader even with adjustment, the battery life is far worse than the galaxy 7 edge I had and i am using it fsr less. Additionally the speaker is of poor quality and voice to text does not function  most of the times or inaccurate when it does. So disappointed .

I've never purchased a factory unlocked phone before, so I was SUPER nervous. It arrived ahead of schedule (BONUS) and works perfectly. I use Verizon pre-paid and it was an easy upgrade on my account and worked right out the gate...couldn't be happier!

Took a few days to get used to the controls but it is a very nice and 3asy to use phone. Great pictures and very versitile. Saved $500 buying it one prime days over buyi g it from either the carrier or Best Buys. Thank you Amazon.
This is a really good product. First I got the empty  box, then replaced it with new one. No complaints  about that now. But s10+ is really cool, it's factory unlocked.  Works with all networks.
The face recognition, I never use. And the face recognition, I never ever used. So I can't comment on either one. But battery life is ok with me, and the performance.

Bought this Samsung Galaxy S10e new from Chubbietech. The description and pics stated new factory unlocked phone. The 2 that I recieved both had sprint SIM cards in them and are locked from sprint. They advised I return the phone because it can not he used with any other carrier at this time.I have requested a fix for the issue at hand. I will update my review if this is resolved rather quickly.
It is super fast. Love it has 8GB of ram.It is very similar size as the s9+.
Love this phone. Runs software extremely well. Light weight. Finger print reader takes some getting used to but very good overall. Battery drains quickly without use which is a little concerning.
Not compatible with my Verizon network. I will be returning.
Item had scratches on screen. Phone wouldnt make or tecieve calls. Sent back.

Love it, performs great, very speedy and responsive. Screen protectors and cases lack options in my opinion. This is my first phone with a curved edge and it only makes screen protectors even more difficult to manage..
The phone is terrific with all the extras from the S8 galaxy phone.
Struggling a bit with Finger print reader. Phone performance and specs are amazing.
I bought it 1 month ago and I am in love with it. I really recommend it to any android user.  Such a good deal

Update: Was an issue at the store, was able to activate with current sim.Went to activate phone at Verizon Wireless corporate store, was told by Verizon that based on the SKU this phone is NOT supported on their network.However, this SKU is not listed on Samsung's website in any fashion at all which is somewhat concerning

So far so good. I like the design, speed and performance. The camera seems pretty high end too. My only disappointment so far is that the AT&T visual voicemail will not work on this model. I will need to find a good substitute for that app and maybe AT&T too now that I own a phone that is good with any carrier.

This phone is amazingly worth everything. I have no complaints. Battery life is unbelievable. I charge it at night when I go to bed. Wake up 7am out all day without having to charge it by the time I get home around 9pm it's only on 40, 30%, that's with my bluetooth on 24/7. Its a beautiful feel in ur hands. I have no complaints it's worth every dime. Love it and love IT!
Just buy s9 plus... they are almost the same ...
So far I love it! Still learning a thing or two. Love the newer features, more storage and  longer battery life. Got a great deal on Amazon too!
This samsungs with exynos9820 chips

I just got this phone yesterday and so far it is an amazing phone! Great performance and beautiful screen! Upgraded from a Galaxy S8 and so far I'd say that it a really good upgrade! The fingerprint sensor in the screen is great and works well.
Slow and defective

The phone is amazing, i mean, i'm coming from an old 2015 samsung A5 so yeah, the phone is obviously amazing compared to that. But beware if you use AT&T cause, for some reason, AT&T restrain some functions for unlocked phones, like wifi calling and other stuff. T-mobile has no problem with that and i'm considering to switch to T-mobile, but there's no way i'm returning this phone for that reason.

Bought this phone for myself, and i am absolutely in love with this phone. Crazy fast and smooth, screen is out of this world and it is really lightweight too! Had a few problems with the ultrasonic fingerprint reader, as sometimes it seems to be slow or doesn't even work at all. But apart from that, highly recommend it.

This phone is SM-G973U1.It has Qualcomm Snapdragon 855 processor.Appearance is one of the best looking mobile phones.The camera function is very powerful.It is a pity that there is  a scratch on the bottom left of the screen.Prime Day I  got it with the price 599$.It is awesome.

I love the Samsung S10E! The camera is excellent and the phone works as advertised.  I am also very pleased with the seller Endlessitems17. The phone was delivered on time and in great condition with all needed components.

Previously had the S7 and this S10 was an excellent upgrade to it. I have seen a dramatic increase in battery life with the S10. It is nice and fast. Scrolling through screens and menus is buttery smooth. I am so glad I was able to get in on this phone during Prime Day. I love it.

Best galaxy ever. It is smaller and I love that. I hate having a big a** cellphone on the pocket, so this one is perfect. Awesome camera, you dont ever miss the 4 cameras of the s10+. This mobile packs a punch. The only complain is the battery life, so get a charging case.

This S10 phone is truly impressive. The face recognition works well. The processor is remarkably fast. Can run more than 1 app at a time without causing any lagging. The camera is next level incredible.

What a deal! To my discriminating eye, this phone is new, no blems, scuffs, scratches, nothing but a perfect product! I was able to get this deal in a very hard to find color as well! The deal was so good that i bought 2 for the price of 1 new. Recommended seller!

Bought the Galaxy S10E for my Mom, who has Tracfone. Bought the BYO Phone Sim Kit, registered the SIM on Tracfone website,  switched numbers to the new SIM, everything transfered over within 15 minutes. Everything worked well. Will update my review after 30 days to see how phone worked. But this phone will work if you have Tracfone, I can confirm this!

Galaxy S10 plus is great.  I like everything about it.  I love changing the features and settings to show my personal preferences.  The only thing I recommend is to make sure you get an US version and not some other countries.  Check the model number on the phone and not just on the box. Take extra caution with 3rd party dealers.

Purchased two of these phones for much cheaper than listed at brick and mortar  stores.  First time I purchase cell phones on line. Transferred files myself. Pleasantly surprised with how easy I was able to set up  this cell phone with my existing service.
This phone is being advertised as the SM-G973U (Snapdragon) however i received the  Exynos version SM-G973F.
The best phone. Amazing screen. Super fast processor.games run very smooth. No delays as compared to Samsung chip. Glad I imported via amazon.
no sta desbloqueado
Haven't tried facial recognition but love the phone. However pretty easily impressed coming from an S6

This is an amazing phone. I am glad I bought it and at a fantastic price. The packaging was not what I expected. And the headphones were not the original  ones that came with the phone but everything else seems to be fantastic.

It's a great phone. I love it. Tremendous prompts to Samsung on this one! Camera, Fingerprint, Battery, and Display are great. From those coming from an s7 or earlier, this camera will blow you away (especially in good lighting). The battery lasts me all day, depending on use.
Samsung phones are a given for me
So far excellent phone. camera is amazing. Lots of space

The S10 plus is a great phone from Samsung. I've loved everything about it so far. Sometimes the fingerprint reader would be a bit slower than my OnePlus 7 Pro, but it wasn't bad at all. If you can save for this model I would. But if not the S10 is a great buy as well.
Great deal for only $600!
So far outstanding  !!!
This phone shuts off randomly all the time in the middle of me using it. Because I've had it for two whole months I can no longer get it replaced.
I  love this phone. I have always had Samsung phones the battery life never lasted but this one I am on it all day and it has not died on me once.  The camera is amazing.
This works fine with straight talk
I'm impressed with this devise, very fluent, excellent bayberry life, perfect screen and the customization is awesome, the best decision I have ever made, I'm very happy with it.
Overall, excellent.  Have not verified proper operation of fingerprint reader, since the update.
I love it there is still so much I don't know about this phone but I find out new stuff everyday

I have never experienced such a bright and adaptive resolution display. It supports 4K HDR video without any lag. Excellent phone and I got it at an excellent deal: Amazon Prime Day. Thank you amazon.
It takes a while for phone to recognize fingerprints and face recognition  sometimes. Battery lasts a long time. Phone runs hot sometimes. Phone is very small.
Exynos version, beware, battery will drain in half a day
I like the design very much. Camera quality particularly the wide lens is awesome. But I don't know why the email notification is not shown automatically. I need to check this issue
For paying for a brand new phone, it looks like it was a return.  It is in nice shape, however, not brand new. It even has a screen protector already on the screen! I did not put it there.
Its definitely the US version but it's not unlocked. Thankfully I was currently using At&t
Es un equipo  genial, la huella dactilar no es tan buena
Us Version with chipset snapdragon 855Box with sealBrandnewIm happy with purchaseRECOMENDEDIM HAPPY
wrong product,not the same model number as listed
product arrived opened & tampered with. phone was dirty along with accessories. phone seemed to have a few issues out of the box. will be returned.
The call recording option is not available, I feel disappointed with that . Secondly most of the time people try to call but can't get to me.
Terrible sound when on a call.
Good overall performance in terms of processing,  camera, battery life but bad fingerprint sensor. Also, face recognition is not fully reliable.
Product received was exactly as defined. Perfection! I love the phone and it was really easy to set up!
Looks and feels great
I love it! It does everything the new phones do but for half the price. I have no complaints! :)
